query:
from(bucket: "iot_attendance")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "attendance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "status")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "status")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
